body_html: I haven't. I may have run into it when I was following our custom op documentation. It sounds like worst case we could add a copy in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh ? Or maybe a genrule before that.

body: I haven't. I may have run into it when I was following our custom op documentation. It sounds like worst case we could add a copy in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.sh ? Or maybe a genrule before that.
